name: Downwell
description: This Point of Interest is located on a planet or similar celestial body, and can only be accessed by vessels with the "lander" tag

name: Lander
description: This vessel is capable of landing on planets and similar celestial bodies.

name: Solid State
description: This vessel does not carry human crew, and is entirely operated by one or more NHPs or sufficiently advanced expert systems.

name: Hangar
description: This vessel can carry drones, fighters, or other deployable craft in a hangar bay or similar facility.

name: Bulk Cargo Holds
description: This vessel has the facilities to transport bulk liquid or solid particulate goods, the quantity of which is determined by the ship's size.

name: Container Mounts
description: This vessel has the mounts, cells, or holds for the transport of standardized intermodal containers, the quantity of which is determined by the ship's size.

name: Cargo Holds
description: This vessel has holds or bays suitable for the storage and transport of general cargo, the quantity of which is determined by the ship's size.

name: Volatiles Storage
description: This vessel has special facilities and containment systems used to transport volatile or hazardous goods, the quantity of which is determined by the ship's size.

name: Passenger Accommodations
description: This vessel has the facilities to transport passengers, the quantity of which is determined by the ship's size.

name: Heavy Lift Capacity
description: This vessel has the facilities to transport exceptionally large or heavy cargo, structural components, construction equipment, and similar items that would not fit in a standard cargo hold.
